measured_by: 0–100 sliding-scale rating (0 = not at all masculine, 100 = extremely masculine)
justification: "Perceived masculinity was measured by rating the target image from 0-not at all to 100-extremely (sliding scale)."

measured_by: 0–100 sliding-scale rating (0 = not at all risk-taking, 100 = extremely risk-taking)
justification: "Perceived risk-taking was measured with a rating from 0-not at all to 100-extremely."

measured_by: Composite of six 9-point semantic differential items (reckless-cautious, irresponsible-responsible, careless-careful, thoughtless-thoughtful, inconsiderate-considerate, imprudent-prudent)
justification: "We measured the extent to which the two pictured investors were perceived as reckless… using 9-point semantic differential scales… Reckless-responsible perceptions were scored by averaging the items together (McDonald's ω = .97)."
"Race perception was measured on a single continuum, using a 9-point bipolar scale from 1 = Eurocentric to 9 = Afrocentric."
"Gender perception was measured on a single dimension, using a 9-point bipolar scale from 1 = masculine to 9 = feminine."

measured_by: Racial stereotypicality ratings (1–7 scale: Not at all Black to Very Black) from Petsko & Bodenhausen (2019)
justification: "We calculated Blackness and Whiteness scores for each of the traits using racial stereotypicality ratings provided by independent samples reported in prior research (Petsko & Bodenhausen, 2019)."

measured_by: Racial stereotypicality ratings (1–7 scale: Not at all White to Very White) from Petsko & Bodenhausen (2019)
justification: The same sentence notes that "Whiteness scores" were computed from the same racial stereotypicality rating scale.

measured_by: Gender stereotypicality ratings (1–7 scale: Not at all masculine to Very masculine)
justification: "Using the trait ratings of these dimensions, we conducted… analyses", noting they "calculated how masculine… the traits selected for each of the risk-taker prototypes" by applying previously obtained gender-stereotypicality ratings.

measured_by: Gender stereotypicality ratings (1–7 scale: Not at all feminine to Very feminine)
justification: The same procedure was used "to calculate how… feminine… the traits selected for each of the risk-taker prototypes" using established gender-stereotypicality ratings.
